git.closest.tag.name: 2.0.0-beta7.2
git.commit.message.full: SolrExportModule lobs are now created in ./modules/solr/lobs; other modules may have a ./modules/<module name> folder to use as a working directory; the current folder is assumed to be the working directory, but other folders may be selected via java system properties (dbptk.home), environment variables (DBPTK_HOME), and programatically (calling ConfigUtils.initialize(workingDir);)
git.commit.message.short: SolrExportModule lobs are now created in ./modules/solr/lobs; other modules may have a ./modules/<module name> folder to use as a working directory; the current folder is assumed to be the working directory, but other folders may be selected via java system properties (dbptk.home), environment variables (DBPTK_HOME), and programatically (calling ConfigUtils.initialize(workingDir);)
git.build.user.name: Bruno Ferreira
git.commit.user.name: Bruno Ferreira
